name: 12 Days of Christmas Calculator/Dating Sim
description:
It's Christmastime and your true love, is perhaps a bit zealous. Will your relationship survive this gift-giving season? Half calculator, half off-the-wall game, and 100% a silly thing that I coded in an afternoon.

Created in response to a friend asking how many gifts your true love gives to you over the 12 days of Christmas.

Note: You may have to hit "restart" to start your game.
